info.title: Traqa API
info.description: Traqa API to enable communication between Shippers and Load Sites for efficient exchange of data in the recycling supply chain

servers.description: User Acceptance Testing Url for Traqa API
Production Base URL for Traqa API
User Acceptance Testing Url for Traqa API V2
Production Base URL for Traqa API for V2

post.description:
Before making requests you need to authorise and exchange your username and password for an IdToken that can be passed in subsequent requests.
* The token will expire after 60 minutes.
* You can use the RefreshToken (which expires after 1 month).
* To refresh: send a POST request to the getToken endpoint with the header refresh_token.

get.description: Retrieve the identifiers of every party which the requestor has the permission to make requests on behalf of.
Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.

post.description: Create a loadplan in Traqa, making the data available to the `loading site` for them to complete the load once the vehicle or container is loaded at site.

get.summary: Retrieve loadplan(s) details by scheduled loading date
get.description: Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.  Using the planned `loading date` as the search term.

get.summary: Retrieve loadplan(s) details by loading reference
get.description: Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.  Using the `loading reference` as a search term.

get.summary: Retrieve loadplan(s) details by scheduled loading date week number
get.description: Retrieve the details for a pending or completed load in Traqa.  Using the `week number` of the planned loading date as a search term.

post.summary: Post the weighing record details for a load
post.description: Provide the weighing details from the weighbridge software to complete a load in Traqa.

get.summary: Retrieve the pre-Annex VII of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Pre Annex VII` a pending load in Traqa.  A document that represents the Annex VII before the load is completed.  Historically this document would be shared to the load site ahead of loading for them to fill in by hand.

get.summary: Retrieve the Annex VII of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve a clean copy the `Annex VII` for a completed load in Traqa.  A legal document that travels with the material during transport and would be signed by the recieving facility.

post.summary: Add the Annex VII of a loadplan
post.description: Provide a copy of the `Annex VII` for a completed load in Traqa.

get.summary: Retrieve the Weighbridge Certificate of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Weighbridge Certificate/Ticket` for a completed load in Traqa.  A document that is used to proove the weights and provide load details.  Sometimes used as the `packing list` in customs.

post.summary: Add the Weighbridge Certificate of a loadplan
post.description: Provide the `Weighbridge Certificate/Ticket` for a completed load in Traqa. An optional upload by the loading site which will overwrite the Traqa produced weighbridge ticket with the load sites branded ticket.  This can be a scan/image/pdf file.

get.summary: Retrieve the Commercial Invoice of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Commercial Invoice` for a completed load in Traqa.  A document used and referenced in the export customs declaration.  Traqa can produce these for the shipper to support the ongoing customs process.

get.summary: Retrieve the Export Accompanying Document of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve the `Export Accompanying Document (EAD)` for a completed load in Traqa.  A document used and referenced in the export customs process to provide proof of a customs declaration and its outcome, contains the MRN and route from HRMC.

get.summary: Retrieve the photos of a loadplan
get.description: Retrieve `loading photos` for a completed load in Traqa.  Search by the `Loading Reference`.

post.description: Provide the `Loading Photos` for a given `Loading Reference` and `Shipper` to Traqa.

get.description: Retrieve the AI analysis text result for NILS tasks, taken from the Weighbridge tickets, hand completed Annex VII and other provided documents.

post.description: Provide the shipper reviewed text from the task to complete the open NILS task as a completed load in Traqa.

HeaderPaginationToken.name: PaginationToken
HeaderPaginationToken.description: Allows pagination of response. Passing this value into subsequent requests retrieves subsequent values from a set.

HeaderAuthorizationToken.name: AuthorizationToken
HeaderAuthorizationToken.description: OAuth 2.0 Access token retrieved from the token endpoint

schema.description: Access token (following OAuth 2.0 standard) with no prefix

schema.title: Order of loadplans
schema.description: Orders retrieved loadplans by scheduled loading date. By default, in ascending order.

ascending.description: This orders the retrieved loadplans in ascending scheduled load-date.

descending.description: This orders the retrieved loadplans in descending scheduled load-date.

schema.title: Status of loadplans
schema.description: Filters retrieved loadplans by status. OPEN loads have yet to be loaded. COMPLETED loads are loaded. By default, retrieves loadplans of both statuses.

open.description: This retrieves loadplans that are not yet loaded.

completed.description: This retrieves loadplans that are loaded.

schema.title: Limit number of loadplans
schema.description: Limits how many loadplans are retrieved. By default, at most 250 loadplans are retrieved

smallLimit.description: This limits the response to 5 loadplans at most.

largeLimit.description: This limits the response to 100 loadplans at most.

schema.description: Date-time of notification creation in ISO 8601 format

externalQueriesAllowed.description: Backend will make queries to external APIs to retrieve required data.

externalQueriesDisallowed.description: Backend will NOT make queries to external APIs to retrieve required data.

schema.title: Scheduled loading date
schema.description: The planned date time of the loading at site, conform to yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss

PathWeekNumber.name: weekNo
PathWeekNumber.description: ISO Week number of the year

Token200.description: Response to an access token request

IdToken.description: Access token used to make subsequent requests

RefreshToken.description: Refresh token used in subsequent access token requests

Common400.description: Server cannot or will not process the request due to client error

message.title: Error Message
message.description: Human readable Error Message providing more information about the error.

Common403.description: The server understood the request, but it refuses to authorize it due to insufficient permissions or authentication failure.

message.title: Error Message
message.description: Human readable Error Message providing more information about the error.

Common404.description: The requested resource could not be found on the server.

errorType.title: Error Type
errorType.description: Human readable Error Type based on HTTP Status Code.

errorMessage.title: Error Message
errorMessage.description: Human readable Error Message providing more information about the error.

requestId.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestTime.description: Date, time, and timezone at which the relevant request was made.

Common500.description: An internal server error occurred while processing the request.

message.title: Error Message
message.description: Human readable Error Message providing more information about the error.

DateOfRequest.title: Date Retrieved
DateOfRequest.description: The date that the notifications information was requested in ISO 8601 format.

Permissions.description: Information on a user's available permissions groups.

Count.title: Groups Count
Count.description: The number of permission groups available.

DateOfRequest.title: Date Retrieved
DateOfRequest.description: The date that the permissions information was requested in ISO 8601 format.

Photos.description: An object containing a list of photos associated with a loadplan.

photos.title: Photos List
photos.description: A list of photos associated with a loadplan.

items.title: Photo
items.description: A photo associated with a loadplan.

Document.description: A document retrieved for a specific load plan.

TaskPost.description: Model for posting data against a particular task.

FilesPost.description: Specify the path to file(s) to be uploaded.

PartyShipper.title: Shipper
PartyShipper.description: The Shipper is the party who is exporting the material and submitting the load plan into Traqa, populates Box 1 on the Annex VII

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for the Shipper
organizationId.description: The shipper Organization Id is usually an EORI number assigned by a government, it can in place of this be a Traqa specific reference.

PartyBuyer.title: Buyer
PartyBuyer.description: Buyer/receiver of shipment. Overwrites the 'buyer' party shown on the commercial invoice

PartyCarrier.title: Ocean Carrier
PartyCarrier.description: The Ocean Carrier for use when containerised freight is moving by deep sea, this will show in Box 5b on the Annex VII

name.title: The Name of the Ocean Carrier
name.description: The Name of the carrier in freetext

PartyConsignee.title: Consignee
PartyConsignee.description: The Consignee is the person who will be receiving the consignment (material); they may not necessarily be the physical destination. This will show in Box 2 of the Annex VII.

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for the Consignee
organizationId.description: The consignee Organization Id is usually an EORI number assigned by a government or a BIC Facility Code.

name.title: Consignee Name
name.description: Free Text Name of the Consignee

PartyLoadingSite.title: Loading Site
PartyLoadingSite.description: The physical Loading Site of the Material which will provide weights to Traqa.  This will appear in Box 6 of the Annex VII

PartyRecoveryFacility.title: Recovery Facility

organizationId.title: A coded identifier for the Recovery Facility
organizationId.description: A coded value for the Recovery Facility, for UK and Europe this should be the EORI if available or if not mutually agreed with Traqa.

name.title: Recovery Facility Name
name.description: Free Text Name of the Recovery Facility

PartyRecoveryFacility.description: The Recovery Facility should ONLY be provided when different to Box 2 (Consignee) if not provided it will default to Consignee.  This will populate Box 7 on the Annex VII

PartyHaulier.title: Haulier

organizationId.title: A coded Identifier for the Shipper
organizationId.description: The Haulier who arrives at site to transport the goods. Populates box 5a on the Annex VII and verified with the EA

PartyHaulier.description: The Haulier who arrives at site to trasport the goods.  Populates box 5a on the Annex VII and verified with the EA

EquipmentNumber.title: Equipment Number
EquipmentNumber.description: The Container Number OR the Trailer number that the goods have been loaded onto

EquipmentType.title: Equipment Type
EquipmentType.description: The ISO Size Type for Deep Sea Containers

EquipmentSeal.title: Seal Number
EquipmentSeal.description: The seal number(s) used to seal the container or trailer after loading, multiple seal numbers can be present on a container, many only load with 1 or for trailers not always used.

items.title: Seal Number
items.description: The seal number used on the transport equipment

DatesActualDepartureTransportEvent.title: Actual Departure Transport Event
DatesActualDepartureTransportEvent.description: The Actual Departure of the laden vehicle from Loading Site from final weigh, populates box 4 on the Annex VII for Departure Time.

DatesActualArrivalTransportEvent.title: Actual Arrival Transport Event
DatesActualArrivalTransportEvent.description: The Actual Arrival of the empty vehicle at Loading Site for the first weigh

DatesScheduledLoadingTransportEvent.title: Scheduled Loading Transport Event
DatesScheduledLoadingTransportEvent.description: The planned date time of the loading at site, conform to yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss

DatesWeighingDate.title: Weighing Date Event
DatesWeighingDate.description: Date of the weighing of trailer or container at a Loading Site. Populates Box 4 on the Annex VII

ReferenceCarriersReferenceNumber.title: Carriers Reference Number
ReferenceCarriersReferenceNumber.description: The Ocean Carrier Booking Number used for tracking containers after loading, only useful for deep sea movements

ReferenceShippersIdentifyingNumberForShi.title: Shippers Identifying Number For Shipment
ReferenceShippersIdentifyingNumberForShi.description: Sales Order number for the shipment for the Shipper to identify a collection of loads moving under same Order in Traqa.

ReferenceConsignee.title: Consignee Reference Number
ReferenceConsignee.description: A reference for the end destination (consignee) to identify the shipment on receipt

ReferenceLoadingSite.title: Reference Number
ReferenceLoadingSite.description: A reference for the loading site to additionally identify any other references such as trading agreement or purchase order, this is used when the pickup reference differs to the loading site reference and will appear on the Annex VII

ReferencePickupReferenceNumber.title: Pickup Reference Number
ReferencePickupReferenceNumber.description: The loading reference the driver will provide to site on arrival, must be unique per load this is a key identifier in Traqa that is agreed between the Load Site and the Shipper.

ReferenceVehicleIdentificationNumber.title: Vehicle Identification Number
ReferenceVehicleIdentificationNumber.description: The registration number of the vehicle, populates box 5a on the Annex VII

ReferenceDespatchNoteNumber.title: Despatch Note Number
ReferenceDespatchNoteNumber.description: The weighbridge ticket number from the loading site.

ReferenceDriverName.title: Driver Name
ReferenceDriverName.description: Name of the driver. Populates box 5a on the Annex VII

ReferencePERN.title: Packaging Export Recovery Note (PERN)
ReferencePERN.description: Information about a PERN thats required to appear on the Annex VII in Box 15, if not claiming a PERN omit from the load plan

percentage.title: Percentage of MT
percentage.description: Percentage of MT to be issued for PERN

LocationsPortOfLoading.title: Port Of Loading
LocationsPortOfLoading.description: A coded reference to the location for the port of loading, used in transport provided by the UN, populates Box 11 on the Annex VII for origin country.

LocationsPortOfDischarge.title: Port Of Discharge
LocationsPortOfDischarge.description: A coded reference to the location for the port of discharge, used in transport provided by the UN, populates Box 12 on the Annex VII for destination country.

LocationsCountriesOfRouting.title: Countries of Routing
LocationsCountriesOfRouting.description: Country of routing codes as an array of ISO 3166 Alpha-2 codes this must include all countries from the country of origin to destination in order

IdentifierGoodsItemNumber.title: Good Item Number
IdentifierGoodsItemNumber.description: The Good Item Number is a linear numeric identifier for the goods in the trade item object.

TradeItems.title: Trade Items
TradeItems.description: The details for the types of materials that are being loaded/exported

items.title: Trade Item
items.description: The detail for the type of material that is being loaded/exported

harmonizeSystemCode.title: Harmonize System Code
harmonizeSystemCode.description: The Harmonised Commodity Code of the material for Customs reporting purposes

description.title: Description of Goods
description.description: A free text description of the type of material that is being loaded/exported.  Populates Box 9 on the Annex VII

ewcCode.title: EWC Code
ewcCode.description: The European Waste Code classification/description of the type of waste.

baselCode.title: Basel Code
baselCode.description: The Basel convention code classification/description of the type of waste.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Number of Bales or other that were loaded. Populates Box 3 on the Annex VII

packageTypeCode.title: Package Type Code
packageTypeCode.description: The type of packaging used for the goods, populates Box 10 on the Annex VII

externalDocs.description: Full list of UK Trade Tariff kind of packages codes

CodeBasel.title: Basel Code
CodeBasel.description: The Basel convention code classification/description of the type of waste.

CodeEWC.title: EWC Code
CodeEWC.description: The European Waste Code classification/description of the type of waste.

CodeRecovery.title: Recovery Code
CodeRecovery.description: Recovery is one of the operations specified in Annex II B of Directive 2006/12/EC.

CodeIncoTerms.title: Incoterms
CodeIncoTerms.description: The Incoterms code for the material movement

CodeHarmonizeSystem.title: Harmonize System Code
CodeHarmonizeSystem.description: The Harmonised Commodity Code of the material for Customs reporting purposes

CodeGoodsLocation.title: Goods Location Code
CodeGoodsLocation.description: Using the relevant codes, enter the location where the goods are located at the time they are declared and available for examination purposes. The Goods Location Code must be precise enough to allow Customs to carry out physical controls on the goods. DE 5/23 CDS, note use of CDS codes over CHIEF Codes as they are different. https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-cds-volume-3-export-declaration-completion-guide/group-5-dates-times-periods-places-countries-and-regions#de-523-location-of-goods-box-30-location-of-goods

CodeWasteCarrierLicense.title: A coded Identifier for the haulier who arrives at site
CodeWasteCarrierLicense.description: The haulier identifier is the waste carrier license number, mandated by the EA.

CodeSCAC.title: SCAC Code
CodeSCAC.description: Ocean Carriers use an identifying code known as SCAC

CodePackageType.title: Package
CodePackageType.description: The package type code of the smallest external packing unit eg. BL or BN

CodeUnitOfMeasure.title: Unit of Measure
CodeUnitOfMeasure.description: Units of measure. The only accepted value is `KGM`

CodeUNLocode.title: UNLocode
CodeUNLocode.description: A coded reference to the location provided by the UN OR the alpha-2 (ISO 3166) country code

CodeEORI.title: EORI Number
CodeEORI.description: This format represents an EORI number. It starts with 2 digit country code e.g 'GB' followed by a 12 digit number.

CodeTraqa.title: Traqa Code
CodeTraqa.description: Traqa created identifying code for a party.

CodeBICFacility.title: Loading Site Code
CodeBICFacility.description: A registered BIC Facility Code to identify the facility the material is being loaded at

WeightTradeItemNet.title: Material Net Weight
WeightTradeItemNet.description: Weight of the Material loaded for movement, exc any pallet or packaging weight.

WeightTradeItemTare.title: Trade Item Tare Weight
WeightTradeItemTare.description: Weight of the Material Packaging eg. pallet or packaging weight.

WeightTradeItemGross.title: Material Gross Weight
WeightTradeItemGross.description: Weight of the Material loaded for movement, populates Box 2 on the Annex VII

WeightVerifiedGrossMass.title: Verified Gross Weight

weightVerificationMethod.title: Weight Verification Method
weightVerificationMethod.description: SOLAS VGM provides 2 methods, for all that are weighed at a weighbridge use method 1.

value.title: Value
value.description: The weight of the laden trailer or container including the tare weight of a container if appropriate

WeightVerifiedGrossMass.description: For container movements this container the Verified Gross Mass or VGM thats mandatory to enter a port for safety.

WeightEquipmentTareWeight.title: Equipment Tare Weight
WeightEquipmentTareWeight.description: The tare weight of the equipment (container or trailer) is required for containerised movements to calculate the VGM.

personName.title: Person Name
personName.description: The name, expressed as text, of this trade contact person.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.description: Telephone communication information for this trade contact.

value.title: Weight Value
value.description: The weight of the equipment, product or other

value.title: Weight Value
value.description: The weight of the equipment, product or other

CommonEmailAddress.title: Email Address
CommonEmailAddress.description: The billing email address for this account.

CommonAddress.title: Address
CommonAddress.description: The provided structured address for a given party

formatted.title: Formatted Address
formatted.description: A formatted address string for display purposes
formatted.example: 123 Main Street, Liverpool, Merseyside, L1 0AA, GB

CommonPricePerTonne.title: Price Per Tonne
CommonPricePerTonne.description: The price per tonne of the material this is a mandatory field if customs is true.

ModelLoadplan.title: Load Plan Model

references.title: References
references.description: References for the movements in Traqa to identify the load and weighbridge ticket along with other useful references as needed and agreed between parties

dates.title: Dates
dates.description: Dates that are relevent to the load plan, namely the planned date time of loading

tradeItem.title: Trade Items
tradeItem.description: The details for the types of materials that are being loaded/exported

items.title: Trade Item
items.description: The detail for the type of material that is being loaded/exported

harmonizeSystemCode.title: Harmonize System Code
harmonizeSystemCode.description: The Harmonised Commodity Code of the material for Customs reporting purposes

description.title: Description of Goods
description.description: A free text description of the type of material that is being loaded/exported.  Populates Box 9 on the Annex VII

transportMeans.title: Transport Means
transportMeans.description: The type of transport means used to move the material, either 'TRAILER' or 'CONTAINER'

NILS.title: Details of Loadplan NILS Flow
NILS.description: Details on state of NILS flow for load-plan. Automated field and should not be provided by shipper.

emailSent.description: Determines whether the loadsite has been emailed with Annex VII and load-plan details prior to loading

ModelLoadplan.description: The Load Plan that is provided by the shipper to a load site via Traqa, this will create new loads in Traqa for loading at a site.

ModelLoadplanCompleted.description: The Load Plan that is provided by the shipper augmented with data provided by the loading site.

ModelLoadplanAny.description: The Load Plan that is provided by the shipper augmented with data provided by the loading site.

ModelWeighingRecord.title: Weighing Record Model

references.title: References
references.description: References that are relevant to the Traqa loads and Shipper and Load Site to enable efficient exchange of loading data

transportEquipment.title: Transport Equipment
transportEquipment.description: The Trailer or Container that is loaded with the material from load site.

transportMeans.title: Transport Means
transportMeans.description: The type of transport means used to move the material, either 'TRAILER' or 'CONTAINER'

accompanied.title: Accompanied
accompanied.description: Whether the transport equipment is accompanied by a driver

dates.title: Dates
dates.description: Dates relevant to the actual movement of material provided by the loading site

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Number of Bales or other that were loaded. Populates Box 3 on the Annex VII

ModelWeighingRecord.description: The Weight payload for a Loading Site to complete the weighing of planned Traqa loads, data comes from the weighbridge software.

mrn.title: MRN
mrn.description: The Movement Reference Number is a unique identifier for the customs declaration.

route.title: Route
route.description: The route of the customs declaration.

code.title: Error Code
code.description: The error code returned by the customs microservice.

description.title: Error Description
description.description: The error description returned by the customs microservice.
description.example: Obligation error: Mandatory Data Element has not been provided.

explanation.title: Error Explanation
explanation.description: The explanation of the error returned by the customs microservice.

details.title: Error Details
details.description: The details of the error returned by the customs microservice.
details.example: Declaration. Consignment. Carrier. Address. Address. Country. Code

customsDeclaration.title: Declare Customs
customsDeclaration.description: Specify whether you would like Traqa to submit a customs declaration to HMRC on your behalf for the load. Default is 'false'.

declaration.title: Customs Declaration Details
declaration.description: Customs declaration details used if Traqa has been tasked on submitting a customs declaration to HMRC on your behalf.

customsOfficeExit.title: Customs Office of Exit
customsOfficeExit.description: Using the relevant Union code, enter the customs office by which it is intended that the goods should leave the customs territory. DE 5/4 CDS

countryOfDestination.description: Destination country. If not provided, `POD` is considered destination for customs declarations.

invoice.description: Details required for the Commercial Invoice and Customs Declaration.

currency.description: Currency code as defined by ISO 4217.

name.title: Organization Name
name.description: The name of the relevant organization.

expiryDate.title: Expiry Date
expiryDate.description: Expiry of identifier (eg. of a waste license)

submitVGM.title: Traqa VGM Submission Permission
submitVGM.description: Determines whether the organisation gives Traqa permission to submit VGM on their behalf.

declareCustoms.title: Traqa Customs Declaration Permission
declareCustoms.description: Determines whether the organisation gives Traqa permission to declare customs on their behalf.

digitalWasteTracking.title: Traqa Digital Waste Tracking Permission
digitalWasteTracking.description: Determines whether the organisation gives Traqa permission to submit digital waste tracking data to Defra.

license.title: EA Registration Number
license.description: A coded Identifier for the organisation, mandated by the EA.

emailAddress.title: Email Address
emailAddress.description: The billing email address for this account.

flat.title: Automation Billing is Flat Rate
flat.description: Determines whether the organisation's automation billing is a monthly flat rate or not.

value.title: Automation Billing Value
value.description: Determines the organisation's automation billing value.

flat.title: Customs Billing is Flat Rate
flat.description: Determines whether the organisation's customs billing is a monthly flat rate or not.

value.title: Customs Billing Value
value.description: Determines the organisation's customs billing value.

xeroContactId.title: Xero Contact ID
xeroContactId.description: Unique identifier of contact in Xero.

TaskPostNILS.title: NILS
TaskPostNILS.description: Model for posting data against a particular task

WeighbridgeData.description: The Weight payload for a NILS to complete the weighing of planned Traqa loads, data comes from the weighbridge software and is verified manually by the Shipper.

references.title: References
references.description: References that are relevant to the Traqa loads and Shipper and NILS to enable efficient exchange of loading data

transportEquipment.title: Transport Equipment
transportEquipment.description: The Trailer or Container that is loaded with the material from load site.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Number of Bales or other that were loaded. Populates Box 3 on the Annex VII

WeighbridgeCertificateName.description: Path to the predicted Weighbridge Certificate image

AnnexVIIName.description: Path to the predicted Annex VII image

DateOfRequest.title: Date Retrieved
DateOfRequest.description: The date that the task information was requested in ISO 8601 format

DateOfRequest.title: Date Retrieved
DateOfRequest.description: The date that the task information was requested in ISO 8601 format
